category: news
title: "IIT Kanpur Incubated Startup Gets Govt Funding To Commercialise AI, Robotics Systems In Automation Industry And Railways"
excerpt: "The Central government has approved funding support to an IIT Kanpur incubated startup for commercialising machine vision and robotics system for automation in manufacturing industry. The Technology Development Board under the Centre's Department of Science and Technology has entered into an agreement with the MLIT-18 Technology Private Limited for \"commercialization of Machine Vision and Robotics System for Automation in Manufacturing Industry\"."
